SA20n1322:4: pañceme bodhisattvāsyāścaryādbhūtā dharmā anuttare samyaksaṃbodhiyāne śikṣamāṇasya veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1322:11: ime pañca bodhisattvānāmāścaryādbhutā dharmā asādhāraṇastadanyaiḥ sarvasattvaiḥ |
SA20n1322:12: pañcemāni bodhisattvasyānāścaryāṇi yaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate |
SA20n1322:14: yad bodhisattvaḥ parahitahetukena duḥkhena sukhātmaka eva san kṛtsnaṃ parahitahetukaṃ duḥkhamabhyupagacchati |
SA20n1322:15: idaṃ bodhisattvasya prathamamanāścaryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate |
SA20n1322:16: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ saṃsāradoṣajño nirvāṇaguṇajña eva ca san sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaḥ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā saṃsāramabhyupagacchati |
SA20n1322:18: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvastūṣṇīṃbhāva-sukharasajña eva san sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaṃ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā sattvānāṃ dharmedeśanāyai prayujyate |
SA20n1322:20: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ [ṣaṭ] pāramitopacitaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sattvapariśuddhipriyastenaiva ca sukhātmakaḥ sattvapariśuddhimevādhipatiṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānāmāśayataḥ samutsṛjati |
SA20n1322:21: na ca punastasya samutsargasya vipākenārthī bhavati |
SA20n1322:23: punaraparaṃ yad bodhisattvaḥ parakāryasvakārya iva sarvaparakāryārthakriyāsu saṃdṛśyate |
SA20n1322:24: idaṃ bodhisattvasya pañcamamanāścaryaṃ yena samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ anāścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ityucyate |
SA20n1322:28: tathā hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthe samaṃ taccittamutpādayati |
SA20n1322:30: bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu ekaputraka iva premasahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati |
SA20n1322:31: bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu ekaputraka eva premasahagatena cittena samacitto bhavati |
SA20n1322:32: bodhisattvaḥ sarvasattveṣu pratītyasamutpanneṣu ca [sarva] saṃskāreṣu sattvasaṃjñeti viditvā bodhisattvo yā ekasya sattvasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāmiti dharmasamatānugatena cetasā sarvasattveṣu samacitto viharati |
SA20n1322:34: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvārthakriyāsahagatena cetasā sarvasattveṣu smacitto viharati |
SA20n1322:42: pañcabhirākāraiḥ sattvā upakāriṇo bodhisattvasya pratyupakāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavanti |
SA20n1322:44: ātmānaṃ guṇaiḥ saṃyojayanti paraguṇādhānāya prayuktāro bhavanti |
SA20n1322:45: anātheṣu duḥkhiteṣu kṛpaṇeṣvapratiśaraṇeṣu sattveṣu sānāthyaṃ kurvanti |
SA20n1322:47: tathāgatābhāṣitañca dharmamukhena vā lekhayitvā vā dhārayanti tañca pūjayanti |
SA20n1322:57: iha bodhisattva ādita eva sattveṣu hitasukhaiṣī bhavati |
SA20n1322:60: iti sarvaṃ pūrvavad veditavyaṃ yadyathā pūjāsevā'pramāṇapaṭale |
SA20n1322:64: pañcabhiḥ prayogairbodhisattvasya sarvasamyaksaṃprayoga saṃgraho veditavyaḥ katamaiḥ pañcabhiḥ |
SA20n1322:69: tatra bodhisattvo'nurakṣaṇā prayogeṇa medhāṃ rakṣati yena sahajena jñānena dharmān laghuladhvevodgṛhṇāti |
SA20n1322:70: smṛtiṃ rakṣati yayā smṛtyā udgṛhītān dharmān dhārayati |
SA20n1322:75: tatra bodhisattvasyānavadyaprayogo yaḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvaviparītaścottaptaścāpramāṇaśca satataśca bodhipariṇāmitaśca |
SA20n1322:77: [ śuddhādhyāśayaprayogaḥ] śuddhādhyāśayabhūmau caryā pratipattibhūmau ca draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA20n1322:78: niyatipatitaprayogo niyatāyāṃ bhūmau niṣṭhāgamanabhūmau ca draṣṭavyaḥ |
SA20n1322:86: tadanyaiśca bodhisattvaiḥ saha paritulanābhimānatā dharmaviparyāsābhimānatā ca |
SA20n1322:88: te punareṣāmeva pañcānāṃ kṛṣṇapakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yathākramaṃ viparyayeṇa veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1322:104: saddharmasya ca prakāśanā saddharmapratirūpakāṇāṃ ca pratikṣepaṇatā |
SA20n1322:105: daśasu sthāneṣu samāsato bodhisattvā vineyān sattvān samyageva vinayanti |
SA20n1322:124: aparimitakālaṃ vyākurvanti na tu kālaniyama kurvanti |
SA20n1322:130: punarekatyo bodhisattvo niyataṃ cittamutpādayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na punastāvatpratyudāvartayati yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate |
SA20n1322:131: punarbodhisattvo vaśitāprāptaḥ sarvāṃ sattvārthacaryāṃ yathecchati yathārabhate tathaivābandhyāṃ karoti |
SA20n1322:136: tatra paścimaṃ niyatipātamārabhya tathāgatā niyatipatitaṃ bodhisattvaṃ vyākurvāṇā vyākurvanti |
SA20n1322:137: pañcemāni sthānāni bodhisattvasyāvaśyakaraṇīyāni bhavanti yānyakṛtvā bodhisattvaḥ abhavyo bhavatyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum |
SA20n1322:149: daśeme dharmā bodhisattvānāṃ pradhānasammatā yān bodhisattvā agrato dhārayantyagryaprajñaptiṣu ca prajñapayanti |
SA20n1322:153: vīryaṃ ca prajñā ca sarvapāramitānāṃ pradhānam |
SA20n1322:166: catvārīmāni bodhisattvānāṃ prajñaptivyavasthānāni yāniṃ bodhisattvā eva samyak prajñapayanti vyavasthāpayanti tathāgatā vā |
SA20n1322:167: na tvanyaḥ kaściddevabhūto vā manuṣyabhūto vā śramaṇabrāhmaṇabhūto vānyatraitebhya evaṃ śrutvā |
SA20n1322:170: tatra yā dvādaśāṅgasya sūtrādikasya vacogatasyānupūrvaracanā anupūrvavyavasthānasamāyogaḥ |
SA20n1322:181: hetusatyaṃ phalasatyaṃ jñānasatyaṃ jñeyasatyaṃ agryasatyaṃ ca |
SA20n1322:183: satyasatyaṃ mṛṣāsatyaṃ parijñeyasatyaṃ prahātavyasatyaṃ sākṣātkartavyasatyaṃ bhāvayitavyasatyaṃ ca |
SA20n1322:185: āsvādasatyaṃ ādīnavasatyaṃ niḥsaraṇasatyaṃ dharmatāsatyaṃ adhimuktisatyaṃ āryāṇāṃ satyaṃ anāryāṇāṃ satyaṃ ca |
SA20n1322:187: saṃskāraduḥkhatāsatyaṃ vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāsatyaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāsatyaṃ pravṛttisatyaṃ nivṛtisatyaṃ saṃkleśasatyaṃ vyavadānasatyaṃ samyakprayogasatyaṃ ca |
SA20n1322:189: anityasatyaṃ duḥkhasatyaṃ śūnyatāsatyaṃ nairātmyasatyaṃ [bhavatṛṣṇāsatyaṃ] vibhavatṛṣṇāsatyaṃ tatprahāṇopāyasatyaṃ sopadhiśeṣanirvāṇasatyaṃ nirupadhiśeṣanirvāṇasatyaṃ [ca] |
SA20n1322:191: aupakramikaduḥkhasatyaṃ bhogavaikalyaduḥkhasatyaṃ dhāturvaiṣamyaduḥkhasatyaṃ priyavipariṇāmaduḥkhasatyaṃ dauṣṭhulyaduḥkhasatyaṃ karmasatyaṃ kleśasatyaṃ tathā śravaṇayoniśomanaskārasatyaṃ samyakdṛṣṭisatyaṃ samyagdṛṣṭiphalasatyaṃ ceti |
SA20n1322:198: caturṣvāryasatyeṣu yā prajñā tasyā eva ca prajñāyā ya āśrayaḥ ālambanaṃ sahāyaḥ karma saṃbhārastasyā eva ca prajñāyā yat phalam ebhiḥ saptabhirākāraiḥ śrāvakayānaprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ sākalyena veditavyam |
SA20n1322:200: nirabhilāpyaṃ vastvālambanīkṛtya sarvadharmeṣu yā tathatā nirvikalpasamatā niryāṇatā prajñā tasyā eva ca prajñāyā ya āśraya ālambanaṃ sahāyaḥ karma sambhārastasyā eva ca prajñāyā yatphalam |
SA20n1322:202: atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvaṣu ye kecidbodhisattvāḥ samyakprajñaptivyavasthānaṃ kṛtavantaḥ kariṣyanti kurvanti vā punaḥ sarve ta ebhiścatubhirvastubhiḥ |
SA20n1322:210: eṣāṃ ca vibhāgaḥ pūrvavadveditavyaḥ tadyathā tattvārthapaṭale |
SA20n1322:213: nāmaparyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastuparyeṣaṇāgataṃ svabhāvaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇāgataṃ viśeṣaprajñaptiparyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānam |
SA20n1322:222: daśasu dikṣuprameyā aprameyanāmalokadhātavastadyathā iyaṃ sahā nāma lokadhāturyasya nāmnā brahmā sahāṃpatirityucyate |
SA20n1322:224: syādekavidho vineyaḥ sarvasattvā vineyā iti kṛtvā |
SA20n1322:235: pratihato madhyasthaḥ vipañcitajñaḥ uddhaṭitajñaḥ tadātvavineyaḥ āpattivineyaḥ pratyayahāryaścavineyo yādṛśān pratyayān labhate tathā tathā pariṇamati |
SA20n1322:240: tathāgatavineyaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhavineyaḥ bodhisattvavineyaḥ kṛcchrasādhyaḥ [akṛcchrasādhyaḥ] ślakṣṇasādhyaḥ avasādanā-sādhyaḥ dūre vineyaḥ antike ca vineyaḥ |
SA20n1322:242: nārakaḥ tairyakyonikaḥ yāmalaukikaḥ kāmāvacaro divyamānuṣyakaḥ āntarābhavikaḥ rūpī arūpī sajñī asaṃjñī naivasajñīnāsaṃjñī ca |
SA20n1322:245: tatra sattvadhātu vineyadhātvoḥ kiṃ nānākaraṇam sattvadhāturaviśeṣeṇa sarvasattvā gotrasthāścāgotrasthāśca |
SA20n1322:246: ye purnagotrasthā eva tāsu tāṣvavasthāsu vartante |
SA20n1322:252: iha bodhisattvo yeṣāṃ sattvānāmarthe prayujyate sa prathamo'prameyaḥ |
SA20n1322:254: sa dvitīyo'prameyaḥ tānpunaḥ sattvāṃsteṣu teṣu lokadhātuṣu yairdharmaiḥ saṃkliśyamānāṃśca viśudhyamānāṃścopalabhate |
SA20n1322:256: tebhyaśca sattvebhyo yānsattvān bhavyān śakyarupānatyantaduḥkhavimokṣāya paśyati |
SA20n1322:259: tasmādete pañcāprameyā bodhisattvānāṃ sarva[kauśala] kriyāyai saṃvartante |
SA20n1322:260: pañceme buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu dharmadeśanāyā vipulāḥ phalānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1322:262: tadekatyāḥ sattvāḥ tasminneva saddharme deśyamāne virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurūtpādayanti |
SA20n1322:263: tadekatyāḥ sattvā deśyamāna eva saddharmataḥ āsravakṣayamanuprāpnuvanti |
SA20n1322:266: śrutamātra eva tasminsaddharme deśitaśca saddharmo buddhairbodhisattvaiśca uddeśasvādhyāyasaṃpratipattipāraṃparyayogena saddharmanetryāścirasthitikatāyai saṃvartate |
SA20n1322:267: itīme pañca deśanāyā vipulāḥ phalānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1322:268: saptemāni mahattvāni yairyuktaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yānaṃ mahāyānamityucyate |
SA20n1322:286: tatra yacca dharmamahattvaṃ yacca cittotpādamahattvaṃ yaccādhimuktimahattvaṃ yaccādhyāśayamahattvaṃ yacca sambhāramahattvaṃ yacca kālamahattvamitīmāni ṣaṭmahattvāni hetubhūmāni samudāgama-mahattvasya |
SA20n1322:288: aṣṭāvime dharmāḥ sarvasya mahāyānasya saṃgrahāya saṃvartante |
SA20n1322:290: tasminneva ca bodhisattvapiṭake ya sarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvārthaprakāśanā |
SA20n1322:291: tasminneva bodhisattvapiṭake yā sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāmacintyā paramodārā prabhāvasaṃprakāśanā |
SA20n1322:297: evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhthante |
SA20n1322:298: ke punaste bodhisattvā ya evaṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante |
SA20n1322:312: sa eva punaravatīrṇo yāvat śuddhāśayabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaśuddhāśaya ityucyate |
SA20n1322:314: sa eva punaḥ śuddhāśayo yāvanniṣṭhāgamanabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaparipakva ityucyate |
SA20n1322:316: sa punaraparipakvo yāvanniyataniyatācaryābhūmau vā nānupraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaniyata ityucyate |
SA20n1322:321: tatra te gotramupādāya yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdaśa bodhisattvā nirdiṣṭāḥ |
SA20n1322:322: ye bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣante teṣāṃ nāta uttari śikṣā vidyate |
SA20n1322:323: yatra śikṣeran yathā ca śikṣeran na ca ebhyo yathā nirdiṣṭebhyo bodhisattvebhya uttari bodhisattvo vidyate yo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate |
SA20n1322:324: teṣāṃ punaḥ sarveṣāṃ eva bodhisattvānāmabhedenimānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni gauṇāni nāmāni veditavyāni |
SA20n1322:325: tadyathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dhīmānuttamadyutiḥ jinaputro jinādhāraḥ vijetā jināṅkuraḥ vikrāntaḥ paramāryaḥ sārthavāho mahāyaśaḥ kṛpālurmahāpuṇyaḥ īśvaro dhārmikaśceti |
SA20n1322:326: teṣāṃ punardaśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvanantānāṃ bodhisattvānāmaprameyāḥ prayātmagatāḥ saṃjñāprāptayo veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1322:327: tatra ye bodhisattvāḥ sma iti pratijñāyāṃ bodhisattvā vartante na ca bodhisattvaśikṣāsu samyak pratipadyante te bodhisattvapratirūpakā veditavyāḥ |
SA20n1322:329: bodhisattvāḥ sma iti pratijñāyāṃ vartante samyak [ca ye] bodhisattvaśikṣāṣu śikṣante te bhūtā bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ |
